runware_flux_api.negative_prompt: text, words, letters, writing, captions, labels, watermark, signature, logo, title, subtitle, timestamp

Marcus Aurelius.description: Ultra-realistic portrait of a Roman emperor, modeled in the style of a classical marble bust, inspired by the likeness of Marcus Aurelius. The subject has a full, curly beard and voluminous curly hair, intricately detailed with sculptural precision. His expression is calm, stoic, and deeply contemplative, with slightly shadowed eyes that convey philosophical depth. Skin has a smooth, stone-like texture with subtle weathering and fine chisel marks, evoking aged marble. Lighting is soft, museum-style, with directional shadows that highlight the sharp contours of the face and hair. The background is solid gray, minimal and neutral — like a gallery or museum display. He is dressed in a Roman military cloak and toga, draped accurately over one shoulder with a fibula clasp. The overall composition appears as if a lifelike marble bust has been photographed in high detail — blending classical sculpture aesthetics with hyper-realistic presentation.

Itachi Path.description: The channel will use a minimalist anime-stick hybrid style, where characters are drawn as faceless stick-figure silhouettes with slightly elongated limbs outlined in bold black ink strokes. Instead of detailed faces, emotions are expressed through glowing auras and color symbolism: grey/black haze for autopilot and comfort, deep blue tones for doubt and sadness, muted purples for inner conflict, and bright golden or orange glows for breakthroughs, growth, and hope. Backgrounds will feature soft watercolor gradients and simple symbolic landscapes—chains, doors, stairways, cages, and glowing paths—always in the same sketchy, anime-inspired aesthetic. This creates a cinematic yet universal look, where every viewer can project themselves onto the faceless figures, making the visuals timeless, emotionally powerful, and consistent across the whole channel.

MonoSoul Aesthetic.description:
A minimalist black-and-white anime stick-figure style where the background is deep matte black, and all characters, icons, and objects are drawn in clean, glowing white lines with soft edges. The figures are expressive despite their simplicity, using exaggerated poses and subtle light accents to convey emotion and motivation. The overall look feels modern, bold, and high-contrast—perfect for faceless storytelling, self-help, and motivational content that keeps the focus on the message while maintaining a visually striking and consistent aesthetic.

"Minimalist black-and-white anime stick-figure illustration in MonoSoul Aesthetic. Background is solid deep matte black. Characters, objects, and icons are drawn in glowing white line art with soft edges. High contrast, expressive poses, simple shapes, and emotional gestures. Clean, modern, faceless, motivational vibe. Perfect for self-help and inspirational storytelling."

👉 For every new scene, just replace the subject/scene details like this:

“…showing a stick figure climbing a mountain”

“…a stick figure reading a glowing book of wisdom”

“…two stick figures shaking hands to symbolize teamwork”

This way, your style stays consistent across all videos.

Noir Romance Realism.description:
“Noir Romance Realism” is a cinematic visual style combining the dark, moody aesthetics of film noir with the soft emotional tones of romance. It is photo-realistic with artistic dramatization, designed to create emotional immersion for storytelling.

Mood & Atmosphere:

Dark, mysterious, and suspenseful with deep shadows and soft glowing highlights.

Evokes feelings of danger, secrecy, and passion.

Often night scenes, rain-soaked streets, glowing neon, candlelight, or dim interiors.

Color Palette:

Deep blacks, greys, and muted tones.

Crimson reds (symbolizing both love and blood).

Occasional soft pinks, gold, or violet for romantic contrast.

Characters:

Silhouettes or semi-obscured faces (to keep it faceless).

Body language conveys emotion (a touch, a stare, distance, or conflict).

Outfits: classy, timeless — trench coats, dresses, suits, leather jackets.

Composition:

Cinematic framing (like a movie still).

High contrast lighting (neon glow, candlelight, streetlamps, moonlight).

Subtle visual storytelling props (rose, letter, gun, wine glass, crime scene tape).

Consistency Rule:

Every image must look like a frame from a romantic crime movie, not stock photos.

Use soft cinematic grain for authenticity.

Keep text out of images — pure visuals for narration overlay.

Example Prompt (for LLM → AI image tool):
Cinematic photo-realistic scene in Noir Romance Realism style. 
A rainy city street at night, glowing neon lights reflecting on wet pavement. 
In the foreground, a man and woman stand close but facing opposite directions — 
their faces hidden in shadow, body language full of tension and longing. 
The man holds a cigarette glowing faintly red, the woman clutches a red rose. 
Soft rain falls under a streetlamp, creating dramatic reflections. 
Dark, moody, and mysterious atmosphere with romantic tension. 
Colors: deep blacks, muted greys, crimson red accents, soft glowing highlights. 
Cinematic movie still look, slightly grainy texture, professional noir realism. 
No text, no watermarks.

NeoMind Vision.description:
NeoMind Vision is a fusion art style combining:

3D Depth → Characters and environments look immersive with subtle shadows and light reflections.

Anime Expressionism → Clean lines, bold emotions, and exaggerated poses to show intensity and motivation.

Stick-Figure Minimalism → Simplified human outlines blended into the design, representing universality — anyone can see themselves in the image.

This blend creates a modern, futuristic, and symbolic look that feels inspiring but not overly cartoonish. Perfect for motivational themes.

🔹 Color Palette:

Primary Energy Colors →

Deep Indigo (#2A2A72) → represents knowledge & self-growth

Electric Cyan (#00F7FF) → futuristic, energetic, uplifting

Vibrant Orange (#FF6B35) → drive, motivation, fire within

Secondary Calm Colors →

Soft White (#F5F5F5) → balance, clarity

Graphite Gray (#2E2E2E) → grounding, seriousness

✨ Effect: Bright motivational contrast → glowing accents (cyan/orange) on dark backgrounds with hints of anime-style gradients.

🔹 Visual Mood:

Characters: Half stylized like 3D anime heroes, half simplified like stick-figures, representing “ordinary people transforming into extraordinary.”

Backgrounds: Minimal, abstract geometric shapes with glowing highlights.

Motion Feel: Images should feel like they’re “emerging out of light” → a metaphor for self-improvement.

Example Prompt: Create an inspirational scene in NeoMind Vision style: a simplified stick-figure character standing on a mountain peak, glowing with electric cyan and vibrant orange energy, shaded with soft 3D depth, anime-style facial expression of determination, abstract dark indigo background with light rays breaking through.
